name: River Tails: Stronger Together - ALPHA DEMO
name_original: River Tails: Stronger Together - ALPHA DEMO
description:
River Tails: Stronger Together (alpha-demo)

Pick a trusted teammate and prepare to experience an epic couch co-op journey through nature in all its glory!

With distinctive asymmetrical gameplay and a colorful cartoon aesthetic, River Tails: Stronger Together is a 3D action-adventure platformer designed around a unique couch co-op system. Friends get the chance to team up and work together to defeat end-of-level bosses and solve puzzles across different natural-world environments.

Take a deep breath and plunge into an immersive world of lush vegetation and glistening waters with Furple the cat & Finn the fish. Traveling together through woodland and river, help them return home in time to fight off the white wolf that is threatening Furple's family.

Embark on an epic and visually stunning journey across land and water, explore the flora of an uncharted tropical forest, soak up the magical atmosphere of its caves, meet a wide range of local wildlife – though be sure to work out which are your friends and which are foes before it’s too late! 

Leap, dive, dart, dodge... and find out how a cat and a fish decided to join forces for an adventure they would never be able to survive alone.

Features:

 Local Co-op Mode ( keyboard&mouse - keyboard&controller - 2 controllers)  Single Payer "Lone Wolf" (two analog sticks controller needed)

 Mysteries and river secrets waiting to be found

 Innovative and constantly evolving gameplay

We want to hear your feedback!

!Please be aware this is an alpha demo and you are going to experience bugs.

!CONTROLLER we had the chance to test it with dual shock 4 and Xbox one controller, we can't guarantee other controllers for now, but please report to us and we can do our best to make it works in the new releases.
